#summary status of the various elements of the SDK

==Release candidate 1==
===IVEF Library===
  * Qt bindings (C++)   
  * Cocoa bindings (Objective-C) 

Released and compiles on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X.  Click on Source and follow the instructions to use SVN and obtain the source. The Objective-C bindings are also available as installable framework in the download section.

===Tools===
To demonstrate the capability of the library, iListen 0.0.2 has been released which demonstrates the core capabilities. This is also available for download as a static compiled  executable for windows. 


==Not yet released==
The SDK with C# bindings is currently in alpha.
